mission_data.mission_description: A call for help from the recently established Eaton Command Base has you playing Cat and Mouse in nebula.^Multi-ship mission for up to 8 ships.

big_message.title: A New Year
big_message.subtitle2: adventure for Artemis 2.7.5

event.name: Initial Distress Call Jump to sector Button
event.incoming_comms_text: We just received the following message from long-range communications.^^----BEGIN ORIGINAL MESSAGE----^...Repeat, this is Eaton Command...*static*^^The TSN Surprise has broken down in-system and we are experiencing major technical interference. ^^We have completely lost contact with our defense fleet. *static*^^A repair crew is enroute for the Surprise. We request that any available ships jump to our sector immediately.^A *static* and enemy forces have been seen---- *static*^^----END ORIGINAL MESSAGE----^^^You are to jump to the Eaton System and render all assistance necessary.^^SYSTEM BEARING: 180^^INITIAL MISSION PARAMETERS:^--Protect Eaton Command and the TSN Surprise.^--Escort the repair team.^--Locate the missing defense fleet.^--Investigate the interference.^^^Sensor and Comms interference in the system is known to be significant, so your mission parameters may change.^^Good luck.

set_ship_text.name: AAA Repair
set_ship_text.hailtext: Hello, and thank you for calling AAA services. We are currently on-route to a disabled vessel, but the nebulae are affecting our navigation systems. If you provide us with a close escort, we can increase our speed.

set_ship_text.name: Repair Crew
set_ship_text.hailtext: The nebulae are affecting our navigation systems. If you can provide us with a close escort, we are willing to increase our speed.

set_ship_text.name: Tech Support
set_ship_text.scan_desc: Upgraded and spare equipment detected.
set_ship_text.hailtext: We've been told not to outrun the other ships. Could you do us a big favor and get down here and escort us all to the Surprise? We promise to make it worth your while if you make sure we all get there and then out of the system again.

event.name: Mission Briefing
event.incoming_comms_text: This is Eaton Command.^^We are experiencing a variety of malfunctions--sensors, shielding, and comms are affected. We have also completely lost contact with our defense fleet.^^The TSN Surprise needs repairs; a team is enroute. Until it is mobile again, you are authorized to draw on its stores.^^Various enemy forces have been observed in surrounding sectors, and we have detected what seem to be faint Skaraan transmissions.^^MISSION PARAMETERS:^^Primary Goals: ^--Defend Eaton Command and the TSN Surprise.^--Locate, identify, and neutralize the source of all disruptions.^--Defeat any enemies in the sector.^^Secondary Goals:^--Locate and assess the status of our missing defense fleet.^--Ensure the entire repair team arrives safely at the Surprise.^--Escort the repair team and the TSN Surprise out of the system after repairs are complete.^ ^^Good luck; we will contact you with any further information.

event.name: 2nd wave Enemy create and Frequency mission set up
event.incoming_comms_text: The science team has picked up some reflected transmissions, and analyzed them as Skaraan operating commands--for something nearby.^^Sorry to ask this of you, but we need you to go scouting.^^The techs aren't sure what the transmissions mean yet.^^Good luck.

event.name: Buoy Disabled, Frequency buttons removed
event.incoming_comms_text: Great work! All the buoys have been disabled.^^The techs want to see them.

set_ship_text.scan_desc: Data scramblers detected! Proximity Scan Required (800m)
Data scramblers detected! Proximity Scan Required (800m)
Data scramblers detected! Proximity Scan Required (800m)

set_ship_text.name: Icarus
set_ship_text.scan_desc: Scan Inconclusive: Possible Life Signs. Approach to 3000m.

event.name: Icarus Power up
event.incoming_comms_text: Opening channel--^This is the Icarus! Thank goodness you're here.^^The entire defense fleet has been destroyed except for us; we only escaped because we powered down and played dead. Thanks to the nebula we never even saw what hit us. ^^We will follow your instructions and do what we can to help. Our shields are pretty well decimated.

event.incoming_comms_text: Opening channel--^This is the Icarus! event.name: AAA Repair Work Completed
event.incoming_comms_text: Thank you for contacting AAA Space Repair!^^We have changed the batteries on the TSN Surprise, and are moving off. ^^Thanks for the protection. We'll find someone to sign the paperwork.
event.warning_popup_message: This is TSN Tech Support. Turns out someone unplugged the Varipole transmitter. Next time, have them check the cables before calling us.^^System reboot is complete; we're out of here.

event.name: AAA Repair Station Dock
event.incoming_comms_text: Docking with the station. ^Thanks for everything!

event.name: Tech Crew Work Completed
event.incoming_comms_text: This is TSN Tech Support. Turns out someone unplugged the Varipole transmitter. Next time, have them check the power cables.^^We would appreciate it if you escort us out of the sector. We have some spare equipment we can give you if so.^^Exit Point: Sector A-5^Escort Duty: Stay Within 8,000m ^
event.warning_popup_message: This is TSN Tech Support. Turns out someone unplugged the Varipole transmitter. Next time, have them check the cables before calling us.^^System reboot is complete; we're out of here.

event.name: Tech Support Escort Confirmed
event.incoming_comms_text: Great, thanks!^We are heading out through sector A5. We'll need someone to stay within 8,000m of our ship until we can jump out.
event.warning_popup_message: Great, thanks!^We are heading out through sector A5. We'll need someone to stay within 8,000m of our ship until we can jump out.
Great, thanks!^We are heading out through sector A5. We'll need someone to stay within 8,000m of our ship until we can jump out.

event.name: Tech Escort Proximity Fail
event.incoming_comms_text: We are reading unidentified vessels... They're pirates!^Mayday, mayday! We are being ambushed! Where is our escort?
event.warning_popup_message: We are reading unidentified vessels... They're pirates!^Mayday, mayday! We are being ambushed! Where is our escort?

event.name: Tech Support Escort Completed
event.incoming_comms_text: This is Tech Support--we are jumping out. Thanks for watching our backs!^^Here's the equipment we mentioned--plus some stuff for scanner cooldown.
event.warning_popup_message: This is Tech Support--we are jumping out. Thanks for watching our backs!^^Here's the equipment we mentioned.

event.name: Tech Support Deletion Escort Success
event.destroy: This is Tech Support--we are jumping out. Thanks for watching our backs!^^Here's the equipment we mentioned.

event.name: Tech Support Deletion Escort Failed
event.incoming_comms_text: This is Tech Support--we are jumping out. ^^Thanks for nothing. Don't call us when your printer breaks!
event.warning_popup_message: This is Tech Support--we are jumping out. Thanks for watching our backs!^^Here's the equipment we mentioned.
event.destroy: This is Tech Support--we are jumping out. Thanks for watching our backs!^^Here's the equipment we mentioned.

event.name: Repair Crew Work Completed
event.incoming_comms_text: We've finished work on the Surprise and need to get to Sector C-5 so we can jump to our next job. ^^Mind giving us an escort? Looks like there's still some shooting going on out there. ^^We can clean up your thrusters on the way and give you a bit of a boost.
event.warning_popup_message: This is TSN Tech Support. Turns out someone unplugged the Varipole transmitter. Next time, have them check the cables before calling us.^^System reboot is complete; we're out of here.

event.name: Repair Crew Escort Confirmed
event.incoming_comms_text: Great, thanks!^We are heading out through sector C-5. We'll need someone to stay within 8,000m of our ship until we can jump out.
event.warning_popup_message: Great, thanks!^We are heading out through sector A5. We'll need someone to stay within 8,000m of our ship until we can jump out.
Great, thanks!^We are heading out through sector A5. We'll need someone to stay within 8,000m of our ship until we can jump out.

event.name: Repair Crew Proximity Fail
event.incoming_comms_text: We are reading unidentified vessels... They're pirates!^Mayday, mayday! We are being ambushed! Where is our escort?
event.warning_popup_message: We are reading unidentified vessels... They're pirates!^Mayday, mayday! We are being ambushed! Where is our escort?

event.name: Repair Crew Escort Completed
event.incoming_comms_text: This is the Repair Crew--we are jumping out. Thanks for watching our backs!^^We fixed up some of your toys. Enjoy!
event.warning_popup_message: This is Tech Support--we are jumping out. Thanks for watching our backs!^^Here's the equipment we mentioned.

event.name: Repair Crew Deletion Escort Success
event.destroy: This is Tech Support--we are jumping out. Thanks for watching our backs!^^Here's the equipment we mentioned.

event.name: Repair Crew Deletion Escort Failed
event.incoming_comms_text: This is the Repair Crew--we are jumping out. ^^Oh, and that rattle in the engines? We're not fixing it for you!
event.warning_popup_message: This is Tech Support--we are jumping out. Thanks for watching our backs!^^Here's the equipment we mentioned.
event.destroy: This is Tech Support--we are jumping out. Thanks for watching our backs!^^Here's the equipment we mentioned.

event.name: Station Side Interference
event.incoming_comms_text: Alert! Incoming comms channels have been scrambled!^^Do not approach the station or TSN Surprise until communications are re-established. ^^All unidentified vessels will be destroyed.

event.name: Production Interference
event.incoming_comms_text: Very well--we'll stop all production if that's what you want!

event.name: Interference Reset 1
event.incoming_comms_text: We got your order--restarting production!

event.name: Station Side Interference Scanned 1
event.incoming_comms_text: Alert! Incoming comms channels have been scrambled!^^Do not approach the station or TSN Surprise until communications are re-established. ^^All unidentified vessels will be destroyed.

event.name: Production Interference Scanned 1
event.incoming_comms_text: We are getting conflicting messages about what to build and whether to fire.^^Production is halted until we sort it out.

event.name: Interference Reset 1 Scanned
event.incoming_comms_text: We got your order--restarting production!

event.name: Orders from Base
event.incoming_comms_text: ALL SHIPS!^^The science team says your sensors have detected up a new kind of Skaraan combat buoy and that there must be more than one--their guess is three. ^^Dont destroy the buoys! ^^There may have a way to disable them, but we need some more information.^^Locate and scan all three buoys as necessary!^^

event.name: Frequencies enabled, instructions
event.incoming_comms_text: Thats it! ^The techs have isolated three signal frequencies which can interfere with the buoy commands. ^^Unfortunately youll have to perform deep scans on each buoy to find the right signal; we also dont know what will happen if you use the wrong one.^^The frequencies must be used at very short range (less than 650m), and are limited to one buoy at a time.^^Once each buoy is disabled, pick it up for later study.
event.warning_popup_message: Thats it! ^The techs have isolated three signal frequencies which can interfere with the buoy commands. ^^The frequencies can be used one at a time, and on one buoy at a time.^^Unfortunately youll have to perform deep scans on each buoy to find the right signal; we also dont know what will happen if you use the wrong one.^^Once each buoy is disabled, pick it up for later study.

event.name: Buoys analyzed Nebula pierce available
event.incoming_comms_text: Good news!^Thanks to those buoys, the techs have figured out how to pierce the nebula's sensor jamming effects. ^^They can only do it for short bursts to prevent our systems from burning out, but it's better than nothing.^^We are transfering control to you. Good hunting.

big_message.title: Complete Mission Failure!
big_message.subtitle2: An ignominius and utter defeat. The sector and every fleet asset has been lost.

big_message.title: Utter Defeat!
big_message.subtitle2: Sector lost; all defensive and offensive fleet assets were destroyed

event.name: Defeat total, Players Destroyed, Surprise and Station lost with some repairs

big_message.title: Total Defeat!
big_message.subtitle2: Sector and primary fleet assets lost to enemy hands.

big_message.title: Utter Defeat!
big_message.subtitle2: The station and a disabled TSN Surprise are on their own...

big_message.title: Major Defeat!
big_message.subtitle2: Only the TSN Surprise remains to defend the station...

big_message.subtitle2: The Surprise escaped, but the station is on its own...

big_message.title: Major Defeat!

big_message.title: Defeat: Pyrrhic Victory
big_message.subtitle2: The starbase and the TSN Surprise were both destroyed. Sector has been abandoned.

big_message.title: Primary Defeat: Pyrrhic Victory

big_message.title: Primary Victory!
big_message.subtitle2: The TSN Surprise was lost, but you saved the station! Sector maintained.

big_message.subtitle2: The starbase and the TSN Surprise are secure.

big_message.title: Exceptional Victory!
big_message.subtitle2: Congratulations! The sector is secure and the TSN Surprise has been repaired.

event.name: Players Win station exists Surprise exits

big_message.title: Exceptional Victory!
big_message.subtitle2: Congratulations! The sector is secure and the TSN Surprise has exited.

event.name: Ultimate Victory Win plus all repair exit

big_message.title: Supreme Victory!
big_message.subtitle2: Congratulations! The sector is secure and all allied ships have exited.
